law.catch_line: Certified association authorized to hold referendum.
law.text: Upon being certified by the Commissioner, the association shall be fully authorized to hold and conduct on the part of the producers of ovine or caprine animals a referendum on the question of whether or not the producers shall levy upon themselves an assessment under, and subject to, and for the purpose stated in KRS 247.6901 to 247.6957. The referendum shall be conducted on a statewide basis.
law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 8, sec. 6, effective July 15, 2008. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 347, sec. 6, effective July 14, 1992.
